issue.title: [Rust] fix parquet crate release version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4171](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4171). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in [this email thread\|[https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/ad8398824ac12ac9228fba6127ccd15b6503d4ee36168ada5f201a88@%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E],] we should keep the sub-crate version to be the same as the main arrow release version. This is to revert a previous change I made before.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4171?focusedCommentId=16735370) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3324
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3324>
